channel.title: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/logo_zpseo9ignaj.png[/img]
[img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/website_zpsfxy6ynxz.gif[/img] [B]Website[/B]: [URL=http://"http://ftpscape.net"]Ftpscape.net[/URL]
[B]Ever wanted to play a F2P remake? Well here's your chance. Ftpscape will be coming out soon with an xp rate ABOVE 5X of current Runescape. In an effort to to be different from OSRS, various things will be different. The XP rate will be one of them.[/B]
[COLOR=red]The [b]red[/b] color code means the feature has not yet been started.[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]The [b]orange[/b] color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]The [b]green[/b] color code means the feature has been finished.[/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][*][color=green]All bones bury-able[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][*][color=green]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR] [*][color=green]All ores can be mined[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Prospecting[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][*][color=red]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR] [*][color=red]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][*][color=red]All fish can be caught[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Big net fishing[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Correct item requirements[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][*][color=green]Picking wheat[/COLOR] [*][color=orange]Filling flour bin[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Bread[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Pizza[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Cakes[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Potatoes[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][*][color=green]All logs light able[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Correct animations[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Clipped[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b]
[ul][*][color=red]All skilling sounds[/COLOR] [*][color=red]Various attacking sounds[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Music on region of player[/COLOR][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][*][color=green]Cook's Assistant[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Sheep shearer[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Pirate's Treasure[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Restless Ghost[/COLOR] [*][color=green]Ernest the Chicken[/COLOR] [*][color=orange]Rune Mysteries[/COLOR][/ul]
Pictures [IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/img1_zpsz3hh0irr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/img2_zpsd2lqsb5v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/img3_zpsf3hlihum.png[/img] [IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/cooking3_zpsveohmvxh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/fire2_zpsjfrfwl94.png[/img] [IMG]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/mining1_zpsioo6nwzy.png[/img]

I support this. I hope that all goes well for this project. ^_^~

Read full topic
item.source: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]

item.title: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]
item.dc:creator: @Pipe_Dream Pipe Dream
item.description:
@Pipe_Dream wrote:

bunny_lover:

No client download, and the website doesnt even work? k

The link appears like this http://%22http//ftpscape.net%22 but with common sense you can easily fix it.

@OP. I am interested in playing your server but it was offline when I tried to connect. I also would like to know if there will be highscores any time soon? I would probably call your server home if you implemented highscores.

Also, what are your plans on the longevity for the server? As it is only a F2P server I can imagine only a small community will develop. Will you lose interest in the future knowing this? I have invested my time into many servers only for it to be taken down with no explanation.

I read on the forums some suggestions for OSRS features. Is this a likely thing to happen? I would hopefully be signing up to the server you advertised, which is a F2P 2006 server.

Let me know so I can make my decision. Trying to tread more carefully now.

Read full topic
item.source: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]

item.title: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Kodiak:

but why… osrs went f2p

Because some people don’t want to play with those new items and features that OSRS has. Like the GE, wilderness items, and most changes to original RS feel.

Also, some people like to play early 2006 content, not late 2007.

Read full topic

item.source: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]

item.title: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]
item.dc:creator: @F2p2006 F2p2006
item.description:
@F2p2006 wrote:

stCky:

What are the various differences to OSRS you’ll be implementing?

Depends on what the community wants.

[SIZE=6]The Cooking Skill[/SIZE]

[ul]The Cooking skill has been added. All of the features are listed below:

Pastry Dough
[list]
Making bread dough is possible with a flour pot and water (jug, bowl, bucket)
Bread dough can be made into a pie shell but adding a pie dish
Pie dish can be added with either redberries (redberry pie), cooked meat (meat pie), or cooking apples (apple pie)
[/list]

Bread dough
[list]Bread dough can be made to create a an uncooked cake with the addition of an egg, pot of flour, bucket of milk, and cake tin.
Uncooked cakes are then used on a range to make a cake
Chocolate cakes can be made by adding a chocolate bar
[/list]

Pizza dough
[list]Pizza dough can be made into regular uncomplete pizzas by adding a tomato, and then into an uncooked pizza with cheese
These uncooked pizzas can be cooked into normal pizzas, then added with anchovies to make anchovy pizzas,and cooked meat to make a meat pizza[/list]

Fished foods
[list]
All fished foods can be cooked
Fished foods have a much lower chance of burning if used on a range
[/list]

Stews
[list]
Incomplete stews are made from adding a potato to a bowl of water
Cooked meat is then added, which lets the player be able to finally cook the stew
[/list]

Other things:
[list]
Uncooked cakes, incomplete pizzas, and incomplete pies must be used on a range to be cooked
All items give their respective xp
[/list]

Some pictures:



[/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: FtpScape - a 2006 remake of F2P Runescape! [Former F2P2006]

[/quote]

[B]Ever wanted to play a F2P remake? Well here’s your chance. Ftpscape will be coming out soon with an xp
rate ABOVE 5X of current Runescape. In an effort to to be different from OSRS, various things will be different.
The XP rate will be one of them.[/B]

[COLOR=orange]The orange color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.[/COLOR]
